|exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B |serial = yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, J11,, (38400 8N1) |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = ZyXELXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^ZyXEL[a-f0-9]{4}$ |default_ch = |manuf = Netronix |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 12/07/2012 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 760559120344 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00BTKZA1Y |asin_country = US |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8188ER;RTL8188ER, C7G46E1 GC30; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = none |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "270-NB0-FW151B004C0 REV.C" is silkscreened on one NBG2105's board. :It's presumably a '''Netronix''' P/N, likely an [[Intelligent Technology FW151B]] The default SSID format for these devices would appear to be '''ZyXEL''' followed by the last two octets of the BSSID (w/ lower case letters). ===Additional info===
